articles.title: Consumers to buy and sell electricity! DERC greenlights peer-to-peer power trading pilot
articles.summary: Delhi is set to revolutionize electricity consumption with a new framework enabling peer-to-peer energy trading. Prosumers with rooftop solar can now sell surplus power directly to other users, transforming homes into mini power plants. This pilot project, launching soon, aims to create a consumer-centric, digitally governed energy ecosystem.
